data.text:
Aeroflot operates six new long-haul Airbus A350-900 aircraft. Our passengers love them as a flight on A350 is not just travelling from A to B but a superb flight experience. 
Today’s #AeroflotInNumbers shows some 2021 operational Facts&Figures about Aeroflot’s A350s. https://t.co/t8XWt3Y7it

Aeroflot has been awarded with the highest 5-Star COVID-19 Airline Safety Rating by Skytrax, the leading independent authority on airline and airport quality. https://t.co/rKzKS2yInc 
For your peace of mind. See you on board!  
#AeroflotSafety #SkytraxCOVIDcertification https://t.co/moRCyenyvS
Aeroflot among first in Russia to complete pilot stage of integration of ‘Tax-3’ Federal Tax Service automated data system https://t.co/JF615bOkrz

Sun-drenched Yerevan is one of the world’s oldest continuously inhabited cities. Armenia’s cozy, hospitable capital filled with mouth-watering flavours will welcome you as a good old friend. Choose the most convenient flights https://t.co/Gr51V0FqKj 
#AeroflotDestinations https://t.co/ybdNh6ZK0x

data.text: Happy Lunar New Year! Wishing everyone a healthy and prosperous Year of the Tiger! https://t.co/Ewv3WsCeW3

Those who love their job can see beauty in most routine procedures.  Aircraft deicing is carried out as near to the departure time as operationally possible. That’s why several deicing vehicles are used at the same time to speed up the process. Beautiful, right? #Aircraftphoto https://t.co/Se8BAJtRyd

data.text: On a flight as a novice flight attendant Alisa got a souvenir from a passenger. It was a Cheburashka doll. Years later, Alisa got clearances for all types of aircraft, became chief flight attendant, got married, travelled a lot. Her lucky charm has always been with her. https://t.co/XG3K4oLMdc

data.text:
150 years ago today, Aleksandr Scriabin Russian composer of piano and orchestral music was born. One of our Boeing 777s is named after the 
composer noted for his exploration of musical symbolism and experiments with colour music. 
#AeroflotGreatNames https://t.co/JJp3NFRSqH

you can order main courses, appetizers, and desserts in addition to the standard meal served. Terms and conditions at https://t.co/LGCKYw8BSq https://t.co/NX0VXbf8cu

data.text:
RT @ManUtd: Where in the world will you be watching tonight's game? 🌍

✈️ @Aeroflot_World

#MUFC | #UCL

Aeroflot has confirmed its leading positions based on Take Off 2021 report by OAG. In Europe, Aeroflot is No.1 by recovery rate with 70% of seat capacity vs Summer 2019. It is the only airline to have seen a full recovery in its domestic airline capacity.
https://t.co/BQBlR8nkE4 https://t.co/5tiMOAUmLp

data.text:
Aeroflot has again been recognized as Europe’s Leading Airline Brand at the European stage of the prestigious World Travel Awards 2021🏆
The award ceremony took place in the Russian pavilion at the Dubai Expo 2020 (UAE).
https://t.co/qLTqlGgoR5 https://t.co/lAL7UMtOA4
Aeroflot is launching three weekly flights to Cancun on Airbus A350, from 18 November. Tickets are available for booking at https://t.co/Gr51V0FqKj https://t.co/UU0XzhollQ

Everyday dog handlers and dogs patrol the airport and inspect planes to ensure safety. A common sight at Sheremetyevo? No wonder! 
The canine service of Aeroflot’s security department celebrates 20th anniversary this year and employs about 70 Shalaikas #Shalaika #SulimovDog https://t.co/E9vZjW2wHM

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

data.text: Shalaikas have an acute sense of smell. Aeroflot uses their unique feature  to develop innovation, incl. new method of dangerous and explosive substances detection and research in early cancer identification by dogs. #Shalaika #SulimovDog https://t.co/aOSDdOozqO

Going to Armenia? You can now fly Aeroflot to both Yerevan and Gyumri. We’ve launched three weekly flights to Armenia’s second largest city. To check schedule and book tickets please go to https://t.co/Gr51V0FqKj #Aeroflot #Gyumri https://t.co/aSblEPtMSK

Aeroflot CEO Mikhail Poluboyarinov has been re-elected to the Board of Governors of IATA. Mikhail Poluboyarinov was elected to three-year term of office running through 2024 at the 77th IATA AGM held  in Boston, USA. https://t.co/oDnS6P4n1Z https://t.co/pb6r2XEOTA

Aeroflot has launched regular flights to Punta Cana, the Dominican Republic. Three weekly services will be operated on Airbus A350 
https://t.co/AByDsFrT18 https://t.co/L3L9SVH72s

Aeroflot has been recognized as the Best Airline in Eastern Europe for the ninth time at the 2021 Skytrax World Airline Awards @skytrax_uk 
Russia’s national carrier has been ranked in the top 25 airlines worldwide and No 4 in Europe. 
https://t.co/Z1fHCDCHAg https://t.co/XRS1B2QbKQ

Aeroflot is making a strong recovery along with the whole of Russian aviation nearing pre-pandemic levels. Read media publications about these operational achievements. We are grateful to our passengers for loyalty! https://t.co/4pzSQQVYQ7 https://t.co/M1gqPhuQa8
Aeroflot Group Announces Operating Results for August 2021 https://t.co/E6sXXAHX2a

Environmental efficiency has long been a priority in our operations. That’s why Aeroflot and Gazprom Neft have agreed to work together on production and use of sustainable aviation fuel (SAF), making history.
Read more https://t.co/qPxNhi28bj 
#AeroflotSustainablyYours https://t.co/2lQZlV55EB

data.text: Aeroflot has successfully completed its trial launch of IATA Travel Pass. The 8-week trial on the Moscow – London - Moscow flights showed IATA Travel Pass can efficiently help passengers navigate international travel safely #AeroflotResponsibleFlying #AeroflotSustainablyYours https://t.co/cGc0WIlFNP

Younger fleet means greener flying. Aeroflot operates 6 brand new A350s with improved environmental performance, 25% lower CO2 emissions, reduced noise level. Enjoy the pictures of our A350 during its scheduled A-check #AeroflotSustainablyYours
#AeroflotResponsibleFlying https://t.co/RhZrskyMHA

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Vaccination is the path towards healthy flying. About 75% of Aeroflot employees are fully vaccinated against COVID-19. Under a vaccination incentive programme each employee who got inoculated is given an extra paid day-off. #AeroflotResponsibleFlying
#AeroflotSustainablyYours https://t.co/i6RSglsVnW

Aeroflot confirms National Corporate Governance Rating of 7++
https://t.co/L5ailDuvcF

In August, Aeroflot was the top performer globally among mainline airlines, according to Monthly On-Time Performance Report by Cirium https://t.co/LH6MsVGqXo
#Aeroflot #Cirium #OnTimePerformance https://t.co/HmatCB4ton
Egypt, we’ve missed you! Aeroflot has opened the sale of tickets for direct regular flights from Moscow to Hurghada and Sharm El Sheikh from 1 October. https://t.co/DVUHrxNIR3 https://t.co/77hnVffvli
Aeroflot and Russian Post expand cooperation to ramp up airmail transportation https://t.co/4V0KEPrPMA

data.text:
Air Transport World/Aviation Week has released its World Airline Report 2021 https://t.co/xWUB0zEFAl. 
Based on its findings, Aeroflot Group ranked 14th globally and 3rd in Europe (among legacy carriers) by passenger traffic in 2020. 
#Aeroflot https://t.co/chJsNB4JOi

Aeroflot has launched sales of tickets for flights to Sri Lanka! From 2 September, direct services from Moscow to Colombo will operate twice a week. 
Details: https://t.co/xqemOagqto 
#Aeroflot #SriLanka https://t.co/cFVzupYvpO

Aeroflot’s main base @svo_airport has for the first time in its history topped the list as Europe’s busiest airport acc. to a report by the Independent. In June, Sheremetyevo welcomed 2.94 mln passengers. https://t.co/gYDeFXv1QX 
Congrats to our colleagues! https://t.co/17RmgsMjD4
Aeroflot Group Announces Operating Results for June 2021 https://t.co/d8Ou3Nrpg7
Aeroflot begins international operations from newest Terminal C of Sheremetyevo Airport @svo_airport  https://t.co/NAPM3YRndz #Aeroflot https://t.co/tsqUR7AAr9

data.text:
Aeroflot has again been named the strongest airline brand globally by Brand Finance. Our strength is in our passengers. 
Details at https://t.co/70Dx3ij5Z9 
#Aeroflot #BrandFinance https://t.co/MPrz2pYzwM

Aeroflot has resumed regular services to Sofia. Four weekly flights will operate from Moscow to Bulgaria’s capital. The first flight to Sofia Airport on 1 July was welcomed with a water cannon salute.  #Aeroflot #Bulgaria https://t.co/ia0LkDvLmL

Aeroflot’s airplane tableware developed by designers Mikhail Chistiakov and Yulia Chistiakova has won a prestigious Red Dot Award https://t.co/JIzUnRU1VD   
#Aeroflot #RedDotDesignAward2021 https://t.co/bb8GQjAJvE
Aeroflot Group Announces Operating Results for May 2021 https://t.co/AwG9Sw2SLD

Congratulating @skyteam on 21st anniversary! Today, the Alliance unites 19 leading global airlines. The trusted partnership was created to ensure maximum comfort and flexibility to passengers. #Aeroflot #SkyTeam https://t.co/ZtQkq8nCOQ

data.text:
Aeroflot has updated rules and procedures for transporting animals. The new regulations are aimed to ensure safety and comfort of all passengers on board. 
Further information for passengers travelling with pets can be found at https://t.co/9CDWa9QFUq https://t.co/xnLu5kluOg

Seychelles are created for rest and relaxation under the swaying palms on tropical paradise beaches. 
Aeroflot has increased the number of flights to Seychelles to four weekly #SayYesToSeychelles https://t.co/hHNHKaa6s7
